If you prefer something with a darker tone, 'Patriot Games' would be a compelling option. It depicts a group of rebels fighting for their freedom and against a tyrannical government.

If you're interested in a sci-fi adventure with a high stakes, 'Battleship' is an immersive and thrilling film. It showcases the horrors of war and the lengths to which people will go to protect their lives.
